name: Unattended motor vehicle
text:
PART XII.  MISCELLANEOUS RULES

     No person driving or in charge of a motor vehicle shall permit it to stand unattended without first stopping the engine, locking the ignition, removing the key from the ignition, effectively setting the brake thereon and, when standing upon any grade, turning the front wheels to the curb or side of the highway. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1]
